apply_change_language_info: Applying this setting will restart your Soca app.
blind_info: Ask for help by calling a volunteer.
cannot_allow_permission_desc: If you cannot allow from the button below, please go to the OS setting to allow it.
call_ended_blind_info: You can call a volunteer again when you need some help.
call_ended_volunteer_info: Keep it up to help the blind user by answering help calls.
connect_with_your_friends_desc: When making calls, we will prioritize you to 'connect with your friends'.
different_device_title: Sign in with a different device
different_device_desc: Your account is automatically signed out on this device
error_auth_sign_in_with_apple_not_suppor: Sign in with Apple account is not supported on your device.
error_auth_user_disabled: Your account has been disabled, please try another account.
error_check_your_connection_desc: You don't seem to have an active internet connection.
error_failed_to_answer_call: Something went wrong, failed to answer the call.
error_failed_to_choose_image: Failed to choose an image, please try again.
error_signed_in: Sorry, you have not been signed in. Please try again.
error_something_wrong_desc: Sorry, We ran into a problem. We'll get it fixed as soon as possible.
fail_to_call_no_volunteers: Volunteers are not available, please try again in a few moments.
fill_in_form_to_continue: Please fill in the form below to continue.
name: Name
no_call_data_yet_blind_desc: Press the call button or use your voice to call a volunteer when you need help.
no_call_data_yet_volunteer_desc: Someone will ask for your help, make sure to turn on your notifications.
permission_permanently_denied_desc: Permission to the requested feature is permanently denied.
permission_restricted_desc: The system denied access to the requested feature. You cannot change this app's status.
select_language_blind_desc: You will call a volunteer in the same language to avoid miscommunication.
select_language_volunteer_desc: You will answer help calls from a blind person with the same language to avoid miscommunication.
sign_in_different_device: You have signed in from another device
sign_in_different_device_info: You have been automatically signed out because your account is signed in from another device.
sign_up_rule_desc: You cannot change your date of birth, gender, and user type after saving this form.
update_app_required_desc: There is a newer version of this application available, Please update to continue.
va_async_calling_volunteer: Calling for volunteers, please wait a moment.
va_call_history_page: You are on the call history page.
va_home_page: You are on the home page.
va_home_page_blind_info: You can call a volunteer by pressing the volume button up and down on your device.
va_home_page_volunteer_info: Someone will ask for your help, make sure to turn on your notifications.
va_please_select_device_language: Please select the language to use this app.
va_sign_in_page: You are on the sign in page.
va_sign_in_required_2: This process will only happen once if you're not signed out from your account.
va_sign_in_required_3: If you're a blind person, please ask someone to help you to complete the sign-in process.
va_sign_up_page: You are on the sign up page.
va_sign_up_required_1: Your account is not registered, please fill out this form to sign up.
va_sign_up_required_2: This process will only happen once.
va_sign_up_required_3: If you're a blind person, please ask someone to help you to complete the sign-up process.
volunteer_info: Answering help calls from a blind.
volunteer_sign_in_info: You can be a volunteer to help blind users.
